entry.title: You're going to make this hard for me, aren't you?
entry.summary:
Author: bethesound

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,381Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 81

Summary: It starts out with joining viral trends, getting Eddie's takes on the latest Doctor Odyssey Episodes, and pranks on teammates. But when a fan comments on a recent TikTok post, "I need to see the guy behind the camera because Eddie looks at him like he wants him for dessert. OMG! What if they're dating?!" Eddie decides to go in a different direction, one that Buck is definitely not prepared for.Buck is the new social media coordinator for the Minnesota Lights, and Eddie Diaz, the teams backup goalie, is all in for making content. What could go wrong?

entry.title: The Variables of Us
entry.summary:
Author: Cloudedz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,104Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: Eddie Diaz has spent years treating his relationship with Evan "Buck" Buckley like an unsolvable equation—too many undefined variables, too much messy emotional calculus. But when a sunlit kitchen accident cracks open the carefully constructed distance between them, Eddie stops pretending he doesn’t know the answer. Buck, ever the self-sacrificing optimist, is convinced he’s a problem Eddie shouldn’t waste time solving—until Eddie’s hands and mouth and stubborn heart rewrite the formula.Set against the quiet chaos of domestic life with Christopher, lazy afternoons tangled on the couch, and late nights testing the limits of Eddie’s patience (and headboard), these two idiots fumble their way from "best friends" to something fiercer, softer, and infinitely more terrifying. Fluff melts into sweat-slicked smut as they navigate first kisses, first fights, and the terrifying thrill of building a love that doesn’t fit neatly into any equation—except their own.Because Eddie Diaz might be a math wizard, but Buck? Buck’s the irrational number that finally makes his universe make sense.

entry.title: Another Call
entry.summary:
Author: Irongalpal

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,314Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 8

Summary: Eddie was packing his suitcase, preparing to go back to Texas yet again when he got the call.A call the felt a little too similar to the one he received just a few weeks ago. But this time it was from Hen. And he wasn't greeted with heartbreaking news. Not immediately, anyways.The 118 (minus Hen) is trapped after a building collapses. Hen calls Eddie for help getting everyone out, yet the only one on his mind was Buck.Or, what I want to happen in the season finale (8x18) and how I want Eddie's feeling realization to go. Mostly written in Eddie's POV, but there are shifts to Buck's as well.

entry.title: Gravity (Between Orbit and Home)
entry.summary:
Author: Siriusstark99

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,242Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 94

Summary: Eddie Diaz is trying to have it all: a cautious romance with Christopher’s teacher, Ana Flores, and the comforting, unshakable presence of his best friend, Buck, in their lives. But when Ana grows increasingly threatened by Buck’s bond with Christopher—and Eddie’s inability to disentangle himself from the man who has become family—the fragile balance shatters. After a disastrous attempt at a “family” dinner forces Eddie to confront the truth about who he’s been prioritizing (and why), a late-night confession changes everything.

entry.title: Where Embers Glow: We Find Our Kin
entry.summary:
Author: Aaylee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,584Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: Evan “Buck” Buckley has spent a lifetime haunted by the ghost of family—a concept that always slipped through his fingers like smoke. Abandoned by parents who saw him as a replacement, shuffled through foster homes that never stuck, he armored himself in recklessness and rootlessness. But when he joins the 118, Buck finds himself drawn into a chaos of shared lasagna dinners, late-night heart-to-hearts, and a stubborn, fire-forged loyalty that won’t let him go. Bobby Nash, with his quiet steadiness, and Athena Grant, with her sharp wisdom, become the anchors he never knew he needed, while Eddie Diaz’s quiet partnership sparks something deeper—a slow-burning promise of more. Buck learns that home isn’t a place you’re given; it’s the people who choose you, again and again.

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,631Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 262

Summary: Buck stumbles across two confidential HR documents in Bobby’s office while dropping off paperwork—one labeled with his name, the other with Eddie's. But they’re not even together, are they?

His mother always said it was a sign of how he was going to be nothing but trouble for the rest of his life.

entry.title: Blue November Star
entry.summary:
Author: ash_ptv

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,352Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Buck and Eddie have a falling out before Eddie moves to Texas, which means they aren't on speaking terms with each other. Buck feels horrible for how things ended and wants to apologize but isn't sure where to start so he decides he needs to spend some time in Texas to truly show he's sorry and possibly tell Eddie about some unresolved feelings. Unfortunately for Buck, he has an accident and doesn't make it to Texas. His accident causes him to lose his memory. So, Evan "Buck" Buckley no longer remembers his name or the names of his loved ones. How will this accident effect Buck in the long run? How will Eddie react learning his former best friend is hospitalized?

entry.title: the trials and tribulations of evan buckley: a comedy
entry.summary:
Author: deanvrse

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,175Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1,064

Summary: “Hen,” he says, voice dripping with mock-seriousness, “have you ever heard of the Pavlovian response? ” Hen blinks, staring at him. There’s a long pause as she processes what he’s just said. Finally, her brow furrows in confusion. “The what now?” “The Pavlovian response.” Buck’s smirk grows wider, his whole body radiating self-satisfaction as he corrects her, drawing out the words with relish. Or Buck thinks he can ‘train' Eddie into falling in love with him by baking him a sweet treat every single day.

entry.title: This isn't nothing
entry.summary:
Author: Buddie_Limar

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 979Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 16

Summary: After a fight with Eddie, Buck can’t sleep. The silence between them stretches until a highway pile-up sends Buck into a collapsing SUV to save a little girl. Trapped, hurt, and convinced he won’t make it out, Buck realizes what he’s truly afraid of: leaving things unsaid. When he wakes up in the hospital, Eddie is there—and so is the truth between them. Angst, anxiety, and finally, peace.

entry.title: People don't leave people if they really are in love
entry.summary:
Author: hxlfbloodprincess

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,784Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 243

Summary: Lucy knew she was going to be stood up, that was just how internet dates went. It didn’t really matter. The date wasn’t exactly the point. It was more about the dating. Sure, that sounded like the exact same thing, but the two were fundamentally different. At least to Lucy. She was still getting used to the idea of not dating Tim if she was completely honest with herself, and this was risk-free. Firehose was not going to show up.ORLucy is trying to get over Tim and Buck is trying to move on after Eddie moved to Texas. Somehow their paths cross and while sparks may not exactly be flying, maybe there's something else between them? Maybe they could be friends?

entry.title: The Summoning
entry.summary:
Author: Dead_pool5

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,054Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 0

Summary: Eddie loses it, the moment Buck steps out, all the memories of them together in heaven flashes, the smiles and whispers they shared, the companionship they fostered came crashing down on Eddie’s mind. He swings again, this time more calculated, strategic. Mirroring the hurt Buck inflicted upon Eddie when he left him. Buck counteracts by dodging and summoning a thunderous lightning hurling it at Eddie. His sword absorbs the shock, momentarily distracted by the lightning Buck swiftly follows up by aiming the spear directly on Eddie’s heart.Then Eddie catches the spear with his hand yanking it towards him and tucks it under his armpit. Bringing Buck in close proximity. At this point their chest to chest. Buck’s breath hitches. He can feel Eddie’s breath on him.“Enough.” Eddie commands.---Or a Buddie enemies to lovers fic where both are angsty idiots that cannot communicate how much they love each other set in the world of Lucifer tv show.

entry.title: and the reason comes on the common tongue of your loving me
entry.summary:
Author: lightyears

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,394Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 128

Summary: Eddie goes to leave, and Buck reaches out to grab him.Eddie goes to leave, and Buck reaches out to grab him, and it’s the first time he’s really touched Eddie since the airport. The first time he’s really touched Eddie since that crushing hug in the arrivals terminal, his face tucked so tight into Eddie’s shoulder that Eddie could feel the wetness of his tears, seeping through his top.Eddie goes to leave, and Buck reaches out to grab him, and when Eddie manages to tear his gaze away from the hand that’s wrapped tight around his arm, it’s to find Buck’s face split in two, a goddamn tragedy written in his expression.He can’t say he’s surprised it’s come to this. Sharp words and accusations across the kitchen.They barely ever fight, but when they do… Or: 8x17 kitchen blowjob.
